turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I’d like you to pick me up a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which store?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Providence Rd and Kempsville Rd by the Food Lion.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what did you want from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Iced Starbucks® Blonde Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want that made with coconut milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size? Tall?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And was that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Iced. I’ll need an extra shot of espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you need any extra flavors or sweeteners?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Uh, yeah, can I get a pump of caramel added?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please charge that on my usual account.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And did you need anything to eat?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks. Just the coffee- ASAP. I’m falling asleep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want me to leave a tip?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just the coffee Marsha. *sigh*

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so I got you a venti iced Iced Starbucks® Blonde Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte with an extra espresso shot.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep. Put a rush on it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order is in at the Starbucks on Providence and will be ready shortly. You’ll get a receipt via text message sent to your mobile device.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks Marsha.

items.name: ced Starbucks® Blonde Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte
